verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> into the land מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> of your habitations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לָכֶֽם׃

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <S%H6213><s%> And will make אִשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H801><s%> an offering by fire לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or זֶ֔בַח <S%H2077><s%> or a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <S%H6381><s%> in performing נֶ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5088><s%> a vow א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בִנְדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> or in a freewill offering א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְּמֹעֲדֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4150><s%> or in your solemn feasts לַעֲשׂ֞וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make רֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> of the herd א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> or of the flock

וְהִקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> Then shall he that offereth הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> bring קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of flour עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> of a tenth deal בָּל֕וּל <S%H1101><s%> mingled בִּרְבִעִ֥ית <S%H7243><s%> with the fourth הַהִ֖ין <S%H1969><s%> [part] of an hin שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of oil

וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine לַנֶּ֙סֶךְ֙ <S%H5262><s%> for a drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ית <S%H7243><s%> And the fourth הַהִ֔ין <S%H1969><s%> [part] of an hin תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou prepare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> with the burnt offering א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לַזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> or sacrifice לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lamb הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> for one

א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or לָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> Or for a ram תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> [for] a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of flour שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> with the third הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> [part] of an hin

וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> And for a drink offering שְׁלִשִׁ֣ית <S%H7992><s%> the third הַהִ֑ין <S%H1969><s%> [part] of an hin תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt offer רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> [for] a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> And when thou preparest בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or זָ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> or [for] a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <S%H6381><s%> in performing נֶ֥דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> or peace offerings לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> Then shall he bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> bull מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of flour שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> of three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals בָּל֥וּל <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> with half הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> an hin

וְיַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> for a drink offering חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> half הַהִ֑ין <S%H1969><s%> an hin אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> [for] an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> Thus shall it be done לַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> bullock הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> for one א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> or for one אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or לַשֶּׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> lambs בַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <S%H3532><s%> of the male א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בָעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> or a kid

כַּמִּסְפָּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> According to the number אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> that ye shall prepare כָּ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> so תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall ye do לָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> to every one כְּמִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <S%H4557><s%> according to their number

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָאֶזְרָ֥ח <S%H249><s%> All that are born of the country יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> shall do כָּ֖כָה <S%H3602><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְהַקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> these things after this manner in offering אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָגוּר֩ <S%H1481><s%> sojourn אִתְּכֶ֨ם <S%H854><s%> for גֵּ֜ר <S%H1616><s%> And if a stranger א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּתֽוֹכְכֶם֙ <S%H8432><s%> with you or whosoever [be] among לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> you in your generations וְעָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> and will offer אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> as ye do כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> so he shall do

הַקָּהָ֕ל <S%H6951><s%> [shall be both] for you of the congregation חֻקָּ֥ה <S%H2708><s%> ordinance אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> One לָכֶ֖ם וְלַגֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> and also for the stranger הַגָּ֑ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth חֻקַּ֤ת <S%H2708><s%> [with you] an ordinance עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> in your generations כָּכֶ֛ם כַּגֵּ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> as ye [are] so shall the stranger יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> be before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> law אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> One וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> manner אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> shall be for you and for the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to בְּבֹֽאֲכֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּאֲכָלְכֶ֖ם <S%H398><s%> Then it shall be that when ye eat מִלֶּ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of the bread הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> an heave offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

רֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H6182><s%> of your dough חַלָּ֖ה <S%H2471><s%> a cake תָּרִ֣ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> Ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> [for] an heave offering כִּתְרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> as [ye do] the heave offering גֹּ֔רֶן <S%H1637><s%> of the threshingfloor כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> so shall ye heave אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

מֵרֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> Of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6182><s%> of your dough תִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> ye shall give לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD תְּרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> an heave offering לְדֹרֹ֖תֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> in your generations ס

וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תִשְׁגּ֔וּ <S%H7686><s%> And if ye have erred וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and not observed אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> all these commandments הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses

אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [Even] all that the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> you by the hand מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD וָהָ֖לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> [Moses] and henceforward לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> among your generations

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> shall be if מֵעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> without the knowledge הָעֵדָה֮ <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation נֶעֶשְׂתָ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Then it shall be if [ought] be committed לִשְׁגָגָה֒ <S%H7684><s%> by ignorance וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall offer כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֡ה <S%H5712><s%> that all the congregation פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָר֩ <S%H1241><s%> bull אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> one לְעֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּמִנְחָת֥וֹ <S%H4503><s%> with his meat offering וְנִסְכּ֖וֹ <S%H5262><s%> and his drink offering כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> according to the manner וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one לְחַטָּֽת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲדַ֛ת <S%H5712><s%> for all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> it was שְׁגָגָ֣ה <S%H7684><s%> them for it [is] ignorance הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> and they הֵבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and they shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנָ֜ם <S%H7133><s%> their offering אִשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H801><s%> a sacrifice made by fire לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְחַטָּאתָ֛ם <S%H2403><s%> and their sin offering לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שִׁגְגָתָֽם׃ <S%H7684><s%> for their ignorance

וְנִסְלַ֗ח <S%H5545><s%> And it shall be forgiven לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַת֙ <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> to לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> them seeing all the people בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> [were] in ignorance ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> And if any תֶּחֱטָ֣א <S%H2398><s%> sin בִשְׁגָגָ֑ה <S%H7684><s%> through ignorance וְהִקְרִ֛יבָה <S%H7126><s%> then he shall bring עֵ֥ז <S%H5795><s%> a she goat בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the first שְׁנָתָ֖הּ <S%H8141><s%> year לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> for the soul הַשֹּׁגֶ֛גֶת <S%H7684><s%> by ignorance בְּחֶטְאָ֥ה <S%H2398><s%> when he sinneth בִשְׁגָגָ֖ה <S%H7683><s%> that sinneth ignorantly לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> for him and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃

הָֽאֶזְרָח֙ <S%H249><s%> [both for] him that is born בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among תּוֹרָ֤ה <S%H8451><s%> law אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> Ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֔ם לָעֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> for him that sinneth בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> through ignorance

וְהַנֶּ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> But the soul אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה ׀ <S%H6213><s%> that doeth בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> able רָמָ֗ה <S%H7411><s%> beguile מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> whether הָֽאֶזְרָח֙ <S%H249><s%> [whether he be] born in the land וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> whether הַגֵּ֔ר <S%H1616><s%> an alien אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> one מְגַדֵּ֑ף <S%H1442><s%> the same reproacheth וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> one מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּזָ֔ה <S%H959><s%> Because he hath despised וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוָת֖וֹ <S%H4687><s%> his commandment הֵפַ֑ר <S%H6565><s%> and hath broken הִכָּרֵ֧ת ׀ <S%H3772><s%> shall utterly תִּכָּרֵ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he עֲוֹנָ֥ה <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity בָֽהּ׃ פ

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And while the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> were in the wilderness וַֽיִּמְצְא֗וּ <S%H4672><s%> they found אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H7197><s%> that gathered עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> sticks בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> upon the sabbath

וַיַּקְרִ֣יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> brought אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַמֹּצְאִ֥ים <S%H4672><s%> And they that found אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מְקֹשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H7197><s%> him gathering עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> sticks אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> him unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> and unto all the congregation

וַיַּנִּ֥יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> And they put אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בַּמִּשְׁמָ֑ר <S%H4929><s%> him in ward כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had not פֹרַ֔שׁ <S%H6567><s%> because it was not declared מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> what should be done לֽוֹ׃ ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall be surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> put to death הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> The man רָג֨וֹם <S%H7275><s%> shall stone אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> him with stones כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וַיֹּצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> brought אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> And all the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> him without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וַיִּרְגְּמ֥וּ <S%H7275><s%> and stoned אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָּאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> him with stones וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> and he died כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses פ
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and bid אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> that וְעָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> them that they make לָהֶ֥ם צִיצִ֛ת <S%H6734><s%> them fringes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כַּנְפֵ֥י <S%H3671><s%> in the borders בִגְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H899><s%> of their garments לְדֹרֹתָ֑ם <S%H1755><s%> throughout their generations וְנָ֥תְנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> and that they put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צִיצִ֥ת <S%H6734><s%> upon the fringe הַכָּנָ֖ף <S%H3671><s%> of the borders פְּתִ֥יל <S%H6616><s%> a ribband תְּכֵֽלֶת׃ <S%H8504><s%> of blue

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶם֮ לְצִיצִת֒ <S%H6734><s%> And it shall be unto you for a fringe וּרְאִיתֶ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> that ye may look אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וּזְכַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H2142><s%> upon it and remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> all the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not תָתֻ֜רוּ <S%H8446><s%> them and that ye seek אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> not after לְבַבְכֶם֙ <S%H3824><s%> your own heart וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after עֵֽינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> and your own eyes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you זֹנִ֖ים <S%H2181><s%> which ye use to go a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּזְכְּר֔וּ <S%H2142><s%> That ye may remember וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָ֑י <S%H4687><s%> all my commandments וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> and be קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> holy לֵֽאלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> unto your God

אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵ֤אתִי <S%H3318><s%> which brought you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> to be your God אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God פ
